channel.title: Need a Codeing team for Pen-Klor
channel.description:
[b][size=15pt]Important![/size][/b]
[i][u]We need a Coding team for...[/u][/i]
[i][b][u][s]PEN-KLOR[/s][/u][/b][/i]
Now here are some Screen shots of my server, I'm not perfect at coding so, Thats is why I am hiring a coding team, there are 5 to 10 slots available, please reply to this post.
[u]People already in the coding team of Pen-Klor::[/u] -Mod Penguinn (me) -Klorox (co-Owner)
[i] Are server Forums are "www.penklorownz.tk" look around it if you like.[/i]
Also, we need a client maker, if anyone would like to give us a link to the program, much appreciated
[size=20pt]Pen-Klor Screen Shots.[/size]
[u]Starting Area[/u] [IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/20gdvuo.jpg[/img] Shops! [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2d7vq0j.jpg[/img] Members Area! [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/29qfocx.jpg[/img]
[size=19pt]Well thats it for now, trust me you will be greatly appreciated if you join![/size]

item.title: Need a Codeing team for Pen-Klor

item.description:
@penguinn wrote:

Hmm, I think that we have that code already inserted because it doesn’t take two clicks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2008, 09:09:52 PM[/size][hr]well are we aloud to bump?
